des_1: I have never imagined that you were going to be this important to me.
des_2: The water shines only by the sun. And it is you who are my sun.
des_3: The meeting of two personalities like the contact of two chemical substances: if there is any reaction, both are transformed.
des_4: The harder the conflict, the more glorious the triumph.
des_5: We are born into each other. No returns. No exchanges.
des_6: I love you - I am at rest with you - I have come home.
des_7: Never above you. Never below you. Always beside you. A lifetime commitment with forever love.
des_8: We love because he first loved us.
